div.head: 手足指末微厥
div.div: slight recession in the tips of the fingers and toes

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

form.pron: Shou zu zhi mo wei jue

entry.def: slight recession in the tips of the fingers and toes

sense.def: Illness Sign of a feeling of slight cold in the tips of hands and feet. Shang han zhi ge 傷寒直格 Mj: 手足指末 微厥，脈浮數而緊者，邪熱在表 , “ Slight recession in the tips of the fingers and toes . The [movement in the] vessels is at the surface, frequent, and tight. Evil heat is in the body’s outer sections”.
